entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `this` keyword for extension method not recommended in partial declaration of static class without `static` modifier #72468
  • [InlineArray] on a ref struct reports CS0306 as error, but CS9184 as a warning #72467
  • Incorrect indentation of list pattern cases in switch expressions #72465
  • Code cleanup "Apply conditional expression preferences" - in latest VS version #72464
  • File scoped namespaces should (arguably) be the default in VS code style settings for new users #72463
  • Custom `IEnumarable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` + Collection Initalizer causes `csc.exe` to crash #72461
  • Collection Initializer cannot handle Extensions akin to `IEnumerable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` ( `IDE0028` vs `CS0029`) #72460
  • Extensions with constrained generic types are not recommended when invoked on a generic method parameter #72457
    Backlog
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72456
  • [Feature Request] Report build times for referenced projects during build #72455
  • Editor config options not populated correctly when project build path includes a symlink? #72453
  • Semantic Snippets Completion #72452
  • Semantic Snippets - Route snippet command handler to new semantic snippets #72451
  • Re-consider usage of ProjectSystemProject._gate #72450

Closed

  • CS8600 after linq Where to filter non null values. #39586
    Backlog
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72378
  • Add `ArgumentKind.ParamCollection` #72222
  • Select clause sometimes copies range variable to local in generated method #72417

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run _CopyPackagesToInsert on non-Windows #72470
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation and Add method with params array #72469
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Suppress Lock conversion warnings when using object equality operators #72459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • DefiniteAssignment: allow unconverted object creation expressions within bad expressions #72454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce closure allocations associated with AsyncLazy usage #72449
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Razor internals #71762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Standardize our Powershell code #72423
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure obsolete diagnostics about required constructor or Add method is suppressible. #72426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cap signing file size to avoid OOMs #72432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused diagnostic methods #72445
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move Linux to building Roslyn.sln #72438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow testing official builds on any branch #72433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
